title: Chapter IX - Unfair Trade Practices
content:
Chapter IX - Unfair Trade Practices

State Regulations

Part 215 - Advertisements Of Accident And Health Insurance (§ 215.1 to 215.18)

Part 216 - Unfair Claims Settlement Practices And Claim Cost Control Measures (§ 216.0 to 216.13)

Part 217 - Processing Of Health Insurance Claims (Subpart 217-1 to 217-2)

Part 218 - Prohibition Against Geographical Redlining And Discriminating In Certain Property/casualty Policies (§ 218.1 to 218.7)

Part 219 - Rules Governing Advertisements Of Life Insurance And Annuity Contracts (§ 219.1 to 219.7)

Part 220 - Holocaust Victims Insurance Claims And Reports (§ 220.1 to 220.8)

Part 221 - Limitations Upon And Requirements For The Use Of Credit Information For Personal Lines Insurance (§ 221.0 to 221.10)

Part 223 - Military Sales Practices (§ 223.1 to 223.7)

Part 224 - Suitability and Best Interests in Life Insurance and Annuity Transactions (§ 224.0 to 224.9)

Part 225 - Use Of Senior-specific Certifications And Professional Designations In The Sale Of Life Insurance And Annuities (§ 225.0 to 225.3)

Part 226 - Unclaimed Life Insurance Benefits And Policy Identification (§ 226.0 to 226.6)

Part 227 - Regulation of Force-placed Insurance (§ 227.0 to 227.8)

Part 229 - Insurer Practices During The Covid-19 Pandemic (§ 229.1 to 229.6)

Part 228 - TITLE INSURANCE RATES, EXPENSES AND CHARGES (§ 228.0 to 228.6)

Part 230 - Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Parity Compliance Program (§ 230.0 to 230.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
